title: Sample, ca. 1942
medium:
Medium: synthetic and metallic yarns
Technique: plain weave
dimensions:
H x W (sample): 10.2 x 17.1 cm (4 x 6 3/4 in.)
H x W (card): 31.8 x 27.9 cm (12 1/2 x 11 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Woven sample mounted to a cardboard card with notations by the designer. Subtle plaid of gray chenille and gold metallic yarns. Warp alternates seven heavy plied gray yarns with five fine gold metallic wrapped yarns. Weft alternates six heavy gray chenille yarns with six fine gold metallic wrapped yarns. Fabric is sheer where the gold metallic yarns intersect in the weave. Selvage on left side.

tombstone.epitaph:
